channel.title: Homes on Mathias Unberath
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Mathias Unberath

item.description: Computer Vision Machine Learning Augmented Realty and Robotics

Biography I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Johns Hopkins University, core faculty in the Laboratory for Computational Sensing and Robotics, and Fellow of sthe Malone Center for Engineering in Healthcare. With my group, the ARCADE research group on Advanced Robotics and Computationally AugmenteD Environments, I build collaborative intelligent systems that support clinical workflows to advance healthcare. Through synergistic research on imaging, computer vision, machine learning, and interaction design, we create human-centered solutions that are embodied in emerging technology such as mixed reality and robotics.
